E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more playing time.
I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
Duane Josephson



Date: Friday, 5/2/1974
Subject: Status of Dave Cripe
Dear Sir,
Dave Cripe isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Victoria Toros!
He has an AVG of .243, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
